long_description: After putting them through long rides and daily lunch escapes, Giro has updated the men's Ride Bike OverShorts. These go-to everyday shorts are cut to stretch and move effortlessly. Nylon/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. 4-way-stretch side panels free up your legs. Stretch gusset adds comfort. Can be worn over cycling undershorts with a chamois (such as the Giro Bike Undershorts, sold separately) for added riding comfort. Giro Ride Bike OverShorts for men have a rear security pocket.
short_description: After putting them through long rides and daily lunch escapes, Giro has updated the men's Ride Bike OverShorts. These go-to everyday shorts are cut to stretch and move effortlessly.
